RenoiseScriptingTool.Author: danoise [bjorn.nesby@googlemail.com]
RenoiseScriptingTool.Name: Duplex Browser
RenoiseScriptingTool.Description: Main userinterface for Duplex, Renoises official scripting API to add interactive, flexible support for MIDI controller devices. The Duplex browser allows you to select the currently supported MIDI controller applications (mixer, pattern matrix, ...) and devices (Launchpad, Novation, Behringer devices and more). Creates a new menu 'Duplex' in the global 'Tools' menu.
